00394 #define eol_vec4d_into_array(ar,vec)   (ar[0] = vec.x,ar[1] = vec.y,ar[2] = vec.z,ar[3] = vec.w)
00395 #define eol_vec3d_into_array(ar,vec)   (ar[0] = vec.x,ar[1] = vec.y,ar[2] = vec.z)
00396 #define eol_vec2d_into_array(ar,vec)   (ar[0] = vec.x,ar[1] = vec.y)

00414 #define eol_vec4d_dot_product(a,b)      (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z+a.w*b.w)
00415 #define eol_vec3d_dot_product(a,b)      (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z)
00416 #define eol_vec2d_dot_product(a,b)      (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y)

00424 #define eol_vec2d_copy(dst,src)  (dst.x = src.x,dst.y = src.y)
00425 #define eol_vec3d_copy(dst,src)  (dst.x = src.x,dst.y = src.y,dst.z = src.z)
00426 #define eol_vec4d_copy(dst,src)  (dst.x = src.x,dst.y = src.y,dst.z = src.z,dst.w=src.w)

00437 #define eol_vec2d_sub(dst,a,b)     (dst.x=a.x-b.x,dst.y=a.y-b.y)
00438 #define eol_vec3d_sub(dst,a,b)     (dst.x=a.x-b.x,dst.y=a.y-b.y,dst.z=a.z-b.z)
00439 #define eol_vec4d_sub(dst,a,b)     (dst.x=a.x-b.x,dst.y=a.y-b.y,dst.z=a.z-b.z,dst.w=a.w-b.w)

00451 #define eol_vec3d_add(dst,a,b)   (dst.x = a.x+b.x,dst.y = a.y+b.y,dst.z = a.z+b.z)
00452 #define eol_vec4d_add(dst,a,b)   (dst.x = a.x+b.x,dst.y = a.y+b.y,dst.z = a.z+b.z,dst.w = a.w+b.w)

00464                                          dst.y = src.y *factor)
00465 #define eol_vec3d_scale(dst,src,factor) (dst.x = src.x *factor,\
00466                                          dst.y = src.y *factor,\
00467                                          dst.z = src.z *factor)

00471                                          dst.w = src.w *factor)

00477 #define eol_vec2d_clear(a)       (a.x=a.y=0)
00478 #define eol_vec3d_clear(a)       (a.x=a.y=a.z=0)

00501 #define eol_vec3d_set(v, a, b, c)  (v.x=(a), v.y=(b), v.z=(c))
00502 #define eol_vec4d_set(v, a, b, c,d)  (v.x=(a), v.y=(b), v.z=(c), v.w=(d))
